features.html: The following question refers to the topic of Romanticism.

choicesHtml: continuations of Protestant traditions of religious and social reform
reactions to attempts to reimpose Catholicism in Protestant areas
concerns over the immigration of non-Christians to Europe
a decrease in the importance of religion as a cause of international conflict
